Package asteonline

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsteOnline
    The main application class.
    Auction
    The class representing an Auction in the system.
    AuctionManager
    Class in charge to manage and save the auctions.
    AuctionObserver
    Observer used to notify the users of the state change of the auctions in which they bidded.
    Item
    Item that can be selled or used to make an offer in the bidding system.
    Offer
    Represents an offer in the system.
    Transaction
    Represent the payment of an offer.
    TransactionManager
    The class in charge to manage and memorize the transactions.
    User
    The class representing the user in the system
    UserManager
    The class in charge to memorize and provide login and logout functionalities in the cannolo.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Category
    Eumeration representing the category of items that can be selled in the system.
